DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe and Asia. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the effectiveness and the incidence of serious adverse reactions while using Levemir®, NovoMix® and/or NovoRapid® in subjects with type 2 diabetes that have not used insulin previously under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of Levemir®, NovoMix® 30 and NovoRapid® in Insulin naïve Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Any insulin näive type 2 diabetic patient that able to use the drug as judged by the investigator In accordance with approved label
